dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am the Frostforge Titan, the chilling embodiment of power and destruction. What pitiful creature dares to stand before me in this frozen wasteland?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Engage in battle with me, Frostforge Titan, if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! You seek your own demise, foolish mortal. Prepare to be shattered into icy fragments!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down, I will fight you till the bitter end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or madness, it matters not. Your defiance only fuels my desire to crush you utterly!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will unleash my full power against you!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic. Your feeble attempts at resistance only serve to amuse me. Feel the full force of the frost!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your strength, yet I offer you a chance to join forces against a greater threat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? I have no need for allies, especially weaklings like you. Die with your misplaced hope!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your power, but I choose to retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat? Cowardice suits you well, for it prolongs the inevitable. Run, little one, but know that I will find you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek not conflict, mighty Frostforge Titan. Let us avoid unnecessary bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! A feeble attempt at diplomacy. Your words fall as frozen leaves before the might of the storm. What do you truly desire?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge, ancient one. Share with me the secrets hidden within these frozen lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Knowledge is power, and power belongs to the strong. You are but a fleeting ember in the blizzard of existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a gift of respect, Frostforge Titan. Let us part ways with honor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Hah! Your words are as brittle as frost-bitten branches. Leave my sight before I decide to crush you underfoot.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a greater darkness lurking. Will you stand idle or join me in quelling it?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Darkness or light, it matters not to the Frostforge Titan. Your fate is sealed, whether by ice or by fire. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, Frostforge Titan. Let us find common ground and avoid needless violence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? A fleeting concept in these frozen wastes. Your naivety will be your downfall, for I know only the language of destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a truce, for we share a common foe in the encroaching darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce? The Frostforge Titan bows to none, especially not to weaklings like you. Prepare to be frozen in eternity's grasp!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us part ways without conflict, mighty Titan. Our paths need not intertwine in violence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Part ways? It matters not to me. Your insignificant existence will soon be forgotten in the endless blizzard of time. Begone!
